ygData.subject: Re: Need +int stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Head to Qeynos, and talk to the guy by the bridge on the way to the bank.  He can clue you in to a quest that will yield +3 earings.  These earings are
ygData.messageBody:
James Blanchard wrote:

> From: "James Blanchard" <Redevil001@...>
>
> I'm a level 21 wizard who needs +int items. I have +2 rings and a BiM, but
> have not tried to get any other items or do any quests for I think I'm too
> low a level. If someone could please tell me when I can get some +int items
> and from where, or what quests I could do at my level I'd be greatful.
> Thanks,
> Lott.
>
> P.S. I know about Cubert and the Stein of Mogok, but at the present time I'm
> not able to do these since I'm an evil race on a PvP teams server.

Head to Qeynos, and talk to the guy by the bridge on the way to the bank. He
can clue you in to a quest that will yield +3 earings. These earings are also
dropped as loot in Paw/Lake Rathe (I think, I never obtained a pair that way
myself) You can also have a jeweler whip you up some good stuff. Just do a
/who Enchanter 34 all, and start sending tells. You can also camp Pyzgin in
Qeynos hills for a stone (+9) but that may take some time. Finally, the stien
of Mogguk sells for around 400pp, if you have the cash. Or you can kill king
Tranix :) but thats another story


Cheers
